I'm an IT professional graduated from the Bachelor's Degree in Systems at the UNNE, expert in providing IT solutions, I constantly seek to update myself in the latest technological developments to apply them to my projects. I love to face challenges that the profession requires, I adapt easily to changes, I like to work in a team or alone, if the project requires it, I have the ability to solve problems and achieve the goals proposed by the project in a timely manner. With more than 10 years of experience, I have done work in .NET, PHP, Android, and Python, using the most updated techniques achieving the best performance.
